overview: When you’re in a relationship, you often share clothing items like sweatshirts, or t-shirts. When  you break up, you want it back, but the interaction is just too awkward. Curtis, a nerd with a  secret agenda, breaks into people’s homes to retrieve them for those that have been dumped. One  night, he breaks into a home and meets Sam, a curious frat boy who wants to get to the bottom of  the burglar’s identity. An unexpected friendship is born when identities are revealed, and Curtis  gets a new teammate.
tagline: You Break Up, He Breaks In
title: Ex Gratia
